Description:
Detects the installation of RTCore service. Which could be an indication of Micro-Star MSI Afterburner vulnerable driver abuse

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: RTCore Suspicious Service Installation
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045' and servicename = 'rtcore64'
